option_description: HYBRID: Fail-fast for production dependencies, graceful degradation for development/testing
decision_scope: Applies to all Phase 1 and Phase 2 agents
notes: Hybrid mode approved: strict fail-fast behavior in PRODUCTION, explicit graceful degradation allowed in DEVELOPMENT with mandatory placeholder marking and mode validation.
implementation_requirements: System must support MODE configuration (PRODUCTION vs DEVELOPMENT)
PRODUCTION mode: fail-fast for all missing dependencies
DEVELOPMENT mode: graceful degradation with explicit placeholder marking
All placeholder outputs must be marked with explicit 'PLACEHOLDER' status in _meta
Mode validation required at agent startup
Mode must be explicitly set (no default assumption)

production_mode.bill_parser: Must raise exception if PDF not found
production_mode.member_database_builder: Must raise exception if API unavailable and no cached data
production_mode.briefing_agent: Must validate all inputs exist and are non-empty
production_mode.one_pager: Must validate policy context exists before generation

development_mode.bill_parser: May generate placeholder structure with explicit 'PLACEHOLDER' markers
development_mode.member_database_builder: May generate placeholder member with explicit 'PLACEHOLDER' status
development_mode.briefing_agent: May process placeholders but must mark entire artifact as 'SPECULATIVE'
development_mode.one_pager: May use generic content but must mark as 'INCOMPLETE' with missing dependency list

unblocks: Agent code updates to enforce mode behavior
